ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: taught him by one immensely strong,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: something that a very powerful one has imparted to him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He has been taught by the Extremely Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He has been taught by one mighty in power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The Lord of Mighty Power has taught him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: taught him by one terrible in power,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which one of mighty powers hath taught him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He was taught by [an angel] who is mighty in power,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: One of mighty powers hath taught it him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: taught him by one of great powers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He was taught by one Mighty in Power,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He has been taught (this Quran) by one mighty in power [Jibrael (Gabriel)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: taught by One who is Stern in power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Taught to him by the Extremely Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Taught to him by one intense in strength -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:5] it is, taught to him by, an angel, one of awesome power,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which one of mighty powers hath taught him) Gabriel taught him,
